name: IUDEXIS
description:
In the near future mankind has finally come into contact with extraterrestrial races. Those beings from another world lived together in peace. This encounter marked the beginning of a new technological era for mankind, death itself has become meaningless.

It was soon after that a mysterious arena named Iudexis came to existence.

It's a place where one can fight the fiercest of beasts, a place where contenders can feel the thrill of battle and even glory for some. You are one of them. Gather your team of 4, conquer your foes and ascend to glory.

For information

This project was part of a school assignment, it is still a work in progress and is not representative of the final product we envisioned.

While it is unsure whether this project will be continued or not, we do encourage you to try it out and we would appreciate any feedback.

It was our first try at making a networked game, so it was quite the hurdle to overcome, however there may still be quite a few latency issues.

We did our best to bring you this game within the short span of 5 weeks, and we hope you will enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it.

Thank you and have fun.

How to play:

Choose between a precision rifle, a shotgun and a S.M.G to defeat the boss.

Each weapon has its own ability and needs energy to be used. To gain energy simply shoot the boss on its weak spots.

The precision rifle’s ability is an instant shot dealing a lot of damage, the shotgun shoots a lobbing grenade and the S.M.G heals you for a fraction of the damage done.

You can also jump and dash in a direction once in the air, use this to avoid attacks at the last moment.

-Play in local co-op with up to 4 players

-Defeat unique bosses

-Use weapons with special mechanics to win

-Immerse yourself in a futuristic universe

HAVE FUN !!
